name: Super Gardener Cyber Zero
description:
Plant & Run... or Die

Super Gardener Cyber Zero is a single-player Action game where the player, to save himself and to defend his laboratory, has to dodge enemies attacks, place special turrets and buy upgrades. 

...will you be able to survive until the end?

FEATURES
  • Boss waves
  • More waves = More enemies
  • 3 different power-up effects
  • 3 different types of turrets
  • Coins & lives pickup
GIVE US YOUR FEEDBACK https://forms.gle/V1dBwj2qRkabQeLt8 DEVELOPED BY
